name: The Lost Monk
description:
You play as a monk to fend off the evil spirits of the once living.

Like the duality of man, you have an option - eliminiate your foes or only make them grow stronger...

You realize that there is no escaping so let your faith guide you to take down as many of them as possible.

Game by Paaristõuked

Pixel art by Jan Markus Salum

Programming by Oskar Unn and Mihkel Maspanov
